welcome_message_body: Welcome to Alberton, South Africa! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, vibrant art scene, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Alberton has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Grand Central Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pilanesberg Airport caters to VIP and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lanseria Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
